nodes.text: The Dellaltian Bank and Currency Exchange was the planetary banking institution for the planet Dellalt. The immense, empty structure of Xim the Despot's treasure chambers housed the main branch, located on the southernmost of the planet's three continents. Being a poor society, the bank had very few tenants and operated on a primitive level compared to the financial organizations found on more advanced worlds, and was one of the few offices occupying the vaults. The main branch was supervised by a Steward and his assistant, prior to 1 BBY.
